<h3 id="X31423">X(31423) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {BEVAN, CIRCUMCIRCLE, NINE-POINTS}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 3*a^4+(b+c)*a^3-(5*b^2+2*b*c+5*c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31423) = X(1)-8*X(140) = 3*X(1)+4*X(5690) = X(1)+6*X(26446) = 6*X(2)+X(40) = 9*X(2)-2*X(946) = 15*X(2)-X(962) = 3*X(2)+4*X(6684) = 12*X(2)-5*X(8227) = 8*X(2)-X(31162) = 3*X(40)+4*X(946) = 5*X(40)+2*X(962) = X(40)-8*X(6684) = 2*X(40)+5*X(8227) = 9*X(40)-2*X(20070) = 4*X(40)+3*X(31162) = 6*X(140)+X(5690) = 4*X(140)+3*X(26446) = 10*X(946)-3*X(962) = X(946)+6*X(6684) = 8*X(946)-15*X(8227) = 6*X(946)+X(20070) = 16*X(946)-9*X(31162) = 9*X(962)+5*X(20070) = 8*X(962)-15*X(31162) = 2*X(5690)-9*X(26446) = 10*X(8227)-3*X(31162)</b>

<p>
X(31423) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3523, 9780}, {3624, 9588}, {7989, 16192}<br>
X(31423) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3624, 3526), (9624, 3624)<br>
X(31423) = X(15056)-of-hexyl triangle<br>
X(31423) = {X(i), X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (140, 26446, 1), (5432, 24914, 1)<br>
</p>
